main event: A civilian reported observing a large light moving rapidly in Tampa, Florida, on March 31, 1957.
interesting points: The light was observed for approximately three minutes,The witness stated the light turned 180 degrees and moved south rapidly,The observation was classified as ground-visual,The conclusion suggested it was probably caused by a searchlight off an aircraft,The sighting was reported by an individual with a background as an aviation machinist in the Navy.
sighted object: a large light in the sky
witness description: a civilian who was an aviation machinist with Navy experience
